name: Carbon Protocol
public_notice: Switcheo has rebranded to new Carbon. For detailed information, kindly visit this post.

description.en: Carbon is a decentralized layer 2 cross-chain trading protocol designed specifically to support trading of sophisticated & advanced financial instruments such as options, bonds and futures, at scale.

ico_data.short_desc: Switcheo is a Decentralized Exchange (DEX) built on the NEO platform. It allows for the trustless exchange of NEP-5 tokens and may expand to other cross-chain tokens in the future.

status_updates.description:
🏆 The Maker vs Taker trading competition is now live on Demex! 🚀 Trade on the ETHUSD and/or BTCUSD futures markets for a chance to win from a $20,000 prize pool 🎊

🏁 4 May - 2 June 2022
🏁 ETHUSD & BTCUSD markets w/ 24 June expiry
🏁 Rules https://bit.ly/MakervsTaker

Trade now 👉 https://app.dem.exchange

Demex Futures Trading Competition - Win from a $120,000 Prize Pool!

📍 29 June - 19 July 2021, 11:00 AM UTC
🏆 Win from a $120,000 prize pool -- including a Tesla Model 3!
📖  Register and start trading: app.dem.exchange/competition?intent=register

We’re kicking off the launch of $ETH and $BTC futures on #Demex with a trading competition!

#DemexFutures

Calling all Ethereans! ERC20 SWTH is now live! 
 
🍣 $200k SWTH/ETH of liquidity has been seeded on SushiSwap!

💰 Withdraw directly to your Web3 wallet from Demex!

😎 SWTH is now more accessible than ever. We can't wait to make waves within the Ethereum ecosystem!

Find out more details here 👇
https://blog.switcheo.network/enter-erc20-swth/
